mapper.insert: insert into sys_resource (ID, RESOURCE_NAME, RESOURCE_CODE, PARENT_ID, RESOURCE_LEVEL, SORT, OPEN_FLAG, RESOURCE_TYPE, DELETE_FLAG, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATETIME, RESOURCE_HTML, REMARK ) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{resourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resourceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{resourceLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{openFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{resourceHtml,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update sys_resource set RESOURCE_NAME = #{resourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESOURCE_CODE = #{resourceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=CHAR}, RESOURCE_LEVEL = #{resourceLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPEN_FLAG = #{openFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESOURCE_TYPE = #{resourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATETIME = #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RESOURCE_HTML = #{resourceHtml,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, RESOURCE_NAME, RESOURCE_CODE, PARENT_ID, RESOURCE_LEVEL, SORT, OPEN_FLAG, RESOURCE_TYPE, DELETE_FLAG, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATETIME, RESOURCE_HTML, REMARK from sys_resource where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

select ID, RESOURCE_NAME, RESOURCE_CODE, PARENT_ID, RESOURCE_LEVEL, SORT, OPEN_FLAG, RESOURCE_TYPE, DELETE_FLAG, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATETIME, RESOURCE_HTML, REMARK from sys_resource
